affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 表示行为

bilingual.source: The country is governed by a coalition of parties.
bilingual.target: 这个国家受一个联合政党支配。
联合部队依赖于这样的行动。

bilingual.source: So that coalition is kind of still going on.
bilingual.target: 所以这种联合始终存在着。

bilingual.source: Between 1965 and 1969 Germany had a similar coalition cabinet.
bilingual.target: 1965年至1969年,类似的联合大内阁就曾经哉西德产生过.

bilingual.source: Acting like a coalition truly does produce results.
bilingual.target: 这种像联合体一样的行动是会取得成果的。

bilingual.source: Its government is a three-party coalition of the most unlikely kind.
bilingual.target: 其政府是最不稳固的三党联合。

bilingual.source: Its government is a three - party coalition of the most unlikely kind.
bilingual.target: 其政府是最不稳固的三党联合.

bilingual.source: Usually the far right has been de-fanged in a ruling coalition.
bilingual.target: 通常，极右翼主义在联合统治下失去威力。

bilingual.source: Talks to form a coalition have to wrap up by the end of this week.
bilingual.target: 组建联合政府的谈判必须在本周内完成。

yingyinNormal.en: At the United Nations in New York, I worked to build more support for this coalition to cut off terrorist financing and to stop the flow of foreign fighters into and out of that region.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在纽约的联合国总部，我努力让这一联盟获得更多的支持，切断恐怖分子的资金来源，终止外国分子进出这一区域。

yingyinNormal.en: We're leading the coalition to degrade and ultimately destroy ISIL.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们领导着削弱并最终摧毁ISIL组织的联盟。

yingyinNormal.en: And we'll lead a broad coalition of nations who have a stake in this fight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 同时我们将领导各利益相关国形成广泛同盟共同打击恐怖分子。

yingyinNormal.en: Because we're leading the right way more nations are joining our coalition.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们是正义的一方，因此越来越多的国家加入到我们的阵营。

yingyinNormal.en: Meanwhile, because we're leading the right way more nations are joining our coalition.
yingyinNormal.zh: 同时，由于我们是正义之师，越来越多的国家不断加入我们的阵营。

yingyinNormal.en: You're a coalition builder, a fighter when you have to be. Tell me, where do you see yourself headed?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你能推动合作，必要时候还有股狼劲。告诉我，你怎么看自己的前途？

yingyinNormal.en: I made it clear that America would act as part of a broad coalition and we were joined in this action by friends and partners, including Arab nations.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我重申，美国作为广泛联盟的一部分来开展行动在这一行动中，友邦和盟国也加入了我们，其中包括阿拉伯国家。

yingyinNormal.en: On Friday, a coalition of citizens including business leaders, working moms, labor unions, and more than 65 mayors, told Republicans in Congress to stop blocking a raise for millions of hard-working Americans.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在周五,一个由公民们组成的团体包括商界领袖，工作中的母亲工会以及65位以上的市长告诉国会的共和党人停止阻挠对数百万辛勤工作国人有益的工资上涨。

yingyinNormal.en: And retired Marine general John Allen, who during the Iraq war worked with Sunnis in Iraq as they fought to reclaim their communities from terrorists will serve as our special envoy to help build and coordinate our growing coalition.
yingyinNormal.zh: 已退役的约翰·阿伦将军将作为我们的特使，帮助我们在合作各方之间建立联系和协调行动，阿伦将军在伊拉克战争起家一直与逊尼派合作，与伊拉克人民在反恐中并肩战斗。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: And it gives the Western Association of Fish and Wildlife Agencies (WAFWA), a <highlight>coalition</highlight> of state agencies, the job of monitoring progress.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它还赋予了国家机构联盟——西部鱼类野生生物协会 (WAFWA) 监督进展的工作。

examination_example.sentence: The Labour party has recently announced that it will retain a large part of the <highlight>coalition</highlight>'s spending plans if it returns to power.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 工党最近宣布，如重新掌权，它将保留联盟的大部分支出计划。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: So it's extremely welcome that some government <highlight>coalitions</highlight> have started looking into potentially cutting the working week to four days.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，一些政府联盟已经开始考虑有可能将工作周缩短至四天，这是非常受欢迎的。

examination_example.sentence: This is a sign of the continued allure of creating scientific <highlight>coalitions</highlight> across borders.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是跨界建立科学联盟的持续吸引力的标志。

examination_example.sentence: A <highlight>coalition</highlight> of leading cable providers aims to make interactive advertising available across America later this year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个由领先的有线电视提供商组成的联盟，旨在今年晚些时候在全美范围内提供互动广告。
